text: The Sound and the Fury is a 1959 American movie. Martin Ritt directed it. The story is from the 1929 novel with the same name by William Faulkner. Yul Brynner, Joanne Woodward, Margaret Leighton, Jack Warden, Stuart Whitman, Ethel Waters, Albert Dekker acted in the movie. 20th Century Fox distributed it. ==Other websites== * Category:1959 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Martin Ritt
title: The Sound and the Fury (movie)
